name: Coots Vicious
description:
Revenge of a pet upon thee and thine

-----

Cheers to:

Absolutely beautiful toon cat model. Too bad the model didn't work with Blender, so there was no easy way to fix up the appearance to look more like the actual Coots :c

Inestimably helpful apartment kit

Music:

Menu

Level

-----

BlenderGuru for a brilliant Blender tutorial

ChatGPT for teaching a web developer some stupid stuff about C# and Unity

Numerous other YouTube tutorials on this and that

And yeah, btw, the game was developed by a single person with no previous experience in game dev, modelling, or else. I only know how to code, that's it. That's why it all look like sh*t XD And the gameplay might be somewhat... rage inducing, but not because it is intended to be so. I hope it's only somewhat fun and memes. Enjoy
